Name: Pastora
description:
Pastora is 44 years old and has eight children. She has an elementary school education.

She grows cacao and administers her farm with excellent results. She inherited her small plot of land from her parents over 20 years ago. Thanks to her hard work and dedication, and her focus on complying with good agricultural practices, she has managed to increase the productivity of her cacao trees. She has 0.80 hectares of cacao. She also has land where she grows vegetables and staple grains for her own consumption

In order to implement a nutritional improvement plan for her cacao trees, Pastora seeks a loan through PAC of $300. With this investment and technical advice, she will be able to improve her earnings and her quality of life. This is her second loan through PAC.
